name: Nameless Tower
description:
Nameless Tower is a short 2.5D platform  game developed by a group of students from different nationalities as the final project of the Master in Creation of Video Games from Universitat Pompeu Fabra (UPF).

Controls

WASD - Move the player

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Dash

E - Windstrike (You can open doors and activate switches with the power of the wind)

Right Click (on the air) - Omnidash 

Glide - W
